subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Flyers have won the last two games of the Stanley Cup finals, exposing the Blackhawks’ defense and goaltender Antti Niemi with relentless pressure and effective special teams.
snippet: The Flyers have won the last two games of the Stanley Cup finals, exposing the Blackhawks’ defense and goaltender Antti Niemi with relentless pressure and effective special teams.
